PageWidgetPortable.Title: Auditoria das liquidações>Em auditoria
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CT_EMPENHOAUDITORIAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>((A.STATUS = 2) AND (A.GRUPOALCADA IN(SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B,CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S') OR (A.GRUPOALCADA IN (SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B,CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S'))))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t4600_at6858_hsfc2c1bc0.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Pedidos de empenho>Cadastrados
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CT_PEDIDOSEMPENHOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>((A.USUARIOINCLUIU = @USUARIO OR A.REQUISITANTE = @USUARIO) AND (A.STATUS=1) AND (A.LIBERADO<>'S') AND (A.RECUSADO <> 'S')) AND (A.DATAORCAMENTO >= (SELECT COMPETENCIA FROM CT_COMPETENCIAEMPENHOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(CT_COMPETENCIAEMPENHOS))) AND (A.DATAORCAMENTO < (SELECT COMPETENCIA + 365 FROM CT_COMPETENCIAEMPENHOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(CT_COMPETENCIAEMPENHOS)) )</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2109_at2626_hsa37085c9.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Pedidos de empenho>Confirmados

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Pedidos de empenho>Confirmar
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes:
<SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CT_PEDIDOSEMPENHOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>((A.STATUS = 6) AND ((A.GRUPOALCADA IS NULL AND A.CONFIRMANTE = @USUARIO) OR (A.GRUPOALCADA
IN(SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B,CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >=
A.SEQUENCIAALCADA AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S') OR (A.GRUPOALCADA IN (SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES
B,CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND
B.ATIVO = 'S'))))) AND (A.DATAORCAMENTO >= (SELECT COMPETENCIA FROM CT_COMPETENCIAEMPENHOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(CT_COMPETENCIAEMPENHOS))) AND (A.DATAORCAMENTO < (SELECT COMPETENCIA + 365 FROM CT_COMPETENCIAEMPENHOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(CT_COMPETENCIAEMPENHOS)) )</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2109_at2631_hseb504f08.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
